news.title: Free Software Foundation Europe at SMAU 2003
news.body: Accepting the invitation for the 2003 edition of SMAU (Milan, 2-6 October) by Firenze Tecnologia and Media Innovation Unit, Free Software Foundation Europe will take part in the "Free Software, Patents and Information Technology. The upcoming future" meeting, on 3rd October at 14.30, at Sala Ambasciatori, Palazzo Cisi (2Â° stage).
